messages.title: Caring, credible and on your side
messages.content: This is the most important election in a generation. We have the chance of building a better life here in Northampton with Labour. Or we can have five more years under the Tories, with the devastation of our NHS, tax cuts for the very rich and tough times for the rest of us.

messages.title: The choice is clear - do you want a Tory government that represents big business and those earning the most? Or do you want a Labour MP who will be on your side?
messages.content: As your MP I will work tirelessly to protect the NHS, support young people into careers, increase the minimum wage and provide security in retirement. Together we can build a decent life in a decent society.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Work tirelessly to protect the NHS from privatisation.
Guaranteed jobs for young people, support them into careers.

issues.health: Work tirelessly to protect the NHS from privatisation.

images.caption: Sally Keeble, Your Labour candidate for Northampton North
